mapper.insert: INSERT INTO account_log (uid, mid, type, amount, category, remark) VALUES (#{uid}, #{mid}, #{type}, #{amount}, #{category}, #{remark})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM account_log WHERE mid = #{mid}
SELECT category as name, sum(amount) as value FROM account_log WHERE mid = #{mid} GROUP BY category ORDER BY value DESC
SELECT type as name, sum(amount) as value FROM account_log WHERE mid = #{mid} GROUP BY type ORDER BY value DESC
